meanings.definition: A row of small columns topped by a rail, used as an open parapet, as on a staircase or balcony.
meanings.sent1: The elegant balustrades along the staircase added a touch of sophistication to the house.
meanings.sent2: Visitors admired the intricate design of the balustrades on the balcony.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat tried to balance on the balustrades, pretending to be a tightrope walker.
meanings.sent4: Her words formed a protective balustrade around her emotions, keeping them hidden from others.
meanings.sent5: The moonlight cast a soft glow on the balustrades, creating a magical atmosphere.
